scripts.build:circuits: for circuit in circuits/*.circom; do circom $circuit --r1cs --sym --wasm -o build;done
scripts.export:sample-zkey: for circuit in build/*.r1cs; do snarkjs groth16 setup $circuit powersOfTau28_hez_final_15.ptau zkkeys/$(basename -- $circuit .r1cs).zkey;done
scripts.export:verifier: for zkey in zkkeys/*.zkey; do snarkjs zkey export solidityverifier $zkey verifiers/$(basename -- $zkey .zkey | perl -nE 'say ucfirst').sol;done
scripts.build:contracts: yarn compile && yarn export:sample-zkey && yarn export:verifier
